activity.title: Ice Fall Recovery and Prevention Plan
activity.description: Steps to recover from a fall on ice and prevent future incidents

tasks.title: Assess injuries and seek medical attention if needed
tasks.description: Check for sprains, fractures, or head injuries. Visit urgent care or ER if severe pain or symptoms occur.

tasks.title: Apply RICE method (Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation)
tasks.description: For minor injuries, rest the affected area, apply ice packs, use compression bandages, and elevate to reduce swelling.

tasks.title: Purchase ice cleats or traction devices
tasks.description: Get attachable ice cleats for boots to prevent future falls on icy surfaces.

tasks.title: Review proper walking techniques on ice
tasks.description: Learn penguin walk technique: short steps, flat feet, center of gravity over front leg.

issue: Claude tries to be helpful and creates a plan even for non-planning requests. It interprets 'fall on ice' as something that needs a recovery/prevention plan.
solution_needed: Add guardrails to detect if user input is actually requesting a plan vs just making a statement or asking a question.
